favorites_page_empty_text: Save frames you like by tapping the nearby heart. We'll store 'em safely here for you.
remind_password_title: How do I reset my password?
remind_password_subtitle: Enter your email and we’ll send you a link with instructions to reset your password :-)
disclaimer: I accept the terms and conditions
hero_title: Try {amount} frames at home for free
eye_exam_description: Comprehensive eye exams are available at or next to all of the below stores. (In some areas, exams are provided by independent optometrists.)
help_subtitle: We’re available by phone {phone} every day from {time}.
retail_filter: Stores where I can get an eye exam or update my prescription
product_text: Possible options: a frame without lenses, a frame with single-focal lenses,{br} bifocal, progressive and sun-protection
eyeglasses_text: Prescription eyeglasses, starting at $95, with free shipping and free returns
sunglasses_text: Each pair is equipped with scratch-resistant lenses that block 100% of UVA and UVB rays. Starting at $95, with free shipping and free returns.
quiz_action: Take a quiz to find your frames
video_title: Want to see how our glasses are made?
eyeglasses_home_try_text: Pick five frames to test out for five days—and we’ll ship them to you for free!
sunglasses_home_try_text: Want to try five pairs of glasses or sunglasses in the comfort of your very own home? It’s easy. And fun. And free.
eyeglasses_lenses_text: Every pair of Brillenhof glasses comes with anti-reflective, scratch-resistant lenses that block 100% of UV rays. Pick from a range of lens options to fit your vision needs.
sunglasses_lenses_title: For every pair sold, a pair is distributed to someone in need
sunglasses_lenses_text: Alleviating the problem of impaired vision is at the heart of what we do, and with your help, our impact continues to expand. To this day, we’ve distributed over five million pairs of glasses to people in need.
delivery_block_title: Free shipping and free returns on every order
delivery_block_text: We have a 30-day, hassle-free return or exchange policy as well as a one-year, no scratch guarantee for our lenses; we'll replace your scratched lenses for free within the first 12 months.
locations_link: Search all our stores and showrooms
home_text: Buying glasses should leave you happy and good-looking, with money in your pocket. Glasses starting at $95, including prescription lenses.
